body_html:
You can find where your libcuda.so.1 is located, and add it to your LD_LIBRARY_PATH to resolve this problem. You can find where the library is using the "find" command in your terminal.

Closing the issue as it is clearly a user side setup issue, not a bug in TF.
For problems with your own setup, I recommend using StackOverflow.

You can find where your libcuda.so.1 is located, and add it to your `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` to resolve this problem. You can find where the library is using the "find" command in your terminal.

Closing the issue as it is clearly a user side setup issue, not a bug in TF.
For problems with your own setup, I recommend using StackOverflow.
